subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Seattle completed its undefeated march through the postseason, beating the Atlanta Dream, 87-84, on Thursday night for a three-game sweep in the W.N.B.A. finals.
snippet: Seattle completed its undefeated march through the postseason, beating the Atlanta Dream, 87-84, on Thursday night for a three-game sweep in the W.N.B.A. finals.
